meanings.sent1: The blood flows interorgan to ensure proper functioning.
meanings.sent2: The nerves communicate interorgan to coordinate movements.
meanings.sent3: The organs had a meeting interorgan to discuss their roles.
meanings.sent4: The relationship interorgan between the heart and lungs is crucial.
meanings.sent5: Nutrients travel interorgan through the bloodstream.

meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction between organs.
meanings.sent1: The interorgan communication is essential for bodily functions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the interorgan relationships for medical research.
meanings.sent3: The interorgan dance of the organs was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The interorgan harmony of the body is delicate and complex.
meanings.sent5: The interorgan teamwork ensures our well-being.
